O

o2Arr - Variable in class io.mega.megableparse.MegaSpoPrBean
解析后得到的血氧数组，连续的，间隔时间为每秒。
offhandMinutes - Variable in class io.mega.megableparse.MegaSpoPrBean
离手时长(minutes)
onBatteryChanged(int, int) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
电池电量、状态改变的实时回调 电池只有在MegaBleBattery.normal状态，才能开启监测 充电中MegaBleBattery.charging可以收数据，但不能做开启监测相关动作 请随时响应电池状态改变
onConnectionStateChange(boolean, MegaBleDevice) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
 
onDeviceInfoReceived(MegaBleDevice) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
返回完整的设备信息 idle之前有可能会触发多次，最近一次的信息最为完整
onDfuBleConnectionChange(boolean, MegaBleDevice) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
 
onEnsureBindWhenTokenNotMatch() - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
Bound information changed, please ensure continue bind?
onError(int) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
 
onFail(String) - Method in interface io.mega.megablelib.MegaAuth.Callback
 
onHeartBeatReceived(MegaBleHeartBeat) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
实现心跳
onIdle() - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
设备闲时状态 Important: 每次连接请务必等待本回调发生，才算一次完整的连接进入稳定状态 此状态之前的操作为：绑定(摇晃戒指)、设置时间、用户信息、读取设备基本信息 进入此状态后，开发者/用户才能进行自己的表演。
onKnockDevice() - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
绑定步骤之一： 收到提醒用户摇晃设备，来确认允许用户绑定设备，已绑定时不触发 首次连接戒指、戒指被其他用户绑定导致token不匹配，则触发本回调 token已匹配，则不触发 Please shake device for bind.
onOperationStatus(int, int) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
指令发送的成功回调
onRawdataCount(int, int, int, int) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
rawdata实时计数
onRawdataParsed(int[][]) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
开启rawdata后，实时触发
onRawdataPath(String) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
rawdata默认文件记录路径，在MegaRawdataConfig.isFileEnable() true时有效
onReadSn(byte[]) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
 
onReadyToDfu() - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback

onRssiReceived(int) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
信号强度的回调 idle之后，每隔5秒返回设备rssi值 Rssi value received
onSetUserInfo() - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
在此接口中调用setUserInfo In this callback, please use MegaBleClient.setUserInfo(byte, byte, byte, byte, byte)
onStart() - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
在此接口中调用startWithoutToken或startWithToken In this callback, please use MegaBleClient.startWithToken(String, String) MegaBleClient.startWithoutToken(String, String)
onSuccess(T) - Method in interface io.mega.megablelib.MegaAuth.Callback
 
onSyncDailyDataComplete(byte[]) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
 
onSyncingDataProgress(int) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
若戒指中有多条数据未收取，则每条数据都会触发进度回调
onSyncMonitorDataComplete(byte[], int, int, String, int) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
Important：调用一次MegaBleClient.syncData()，sdk会循环收取监测数据 直到没有监测数据为止MegaBleCallback.onSyncNoDataOfMonitor() 所以本回调会发生多次，建议用List收揽
onSyncNoDataOfDaily() - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
 
onSyncNoDataOfMonitor() - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
sdk循环收监测数据到无数据为止
onTokenReceived(String) - Method in class io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback
绑定步骤之一： 摇晃设备后，token在此回调中返回，以便下次调用startWithToken，需要用户自己保存。
